thread.section_title: BERTRAND Food Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von BERTRAND Food | bertrand.bio
thread.title: Sander Saares
thread.title_full: BERTRAND Food bewertet von Sander Saares

author: Sander Saares
title: Sander Saares
text:
They make the best tasting powdered meal that I have encountered during my 2 years of consuming such products. Deliveries were fast and the accessories they offer (the shakers) are of surprisingly high quality.
What I like most is that their product actually has texture and grit - it is not one of the common "sweet tasting slushies" you get from most others.
My recommended flavor is the Natural one - it is very smooth and almost unnoticable. I liken it to fueling my body like I would fuel my car - the taste is unremarkable and does not catch my attention, it is just pleasant. Uniquely enjoyable!
I am very happy and plan to be their customer for a long time to come.
